comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Marie Wagner (1883-1975) was an American tennis champion: www.tennisfame.com/famer.aspx?pgID=867&hof_id=111

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia for her: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marie_Wagner

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of September 21, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9806EED7113BE633A... indicates that Wagner defeated Beard in the semi-finals of the Montclair Athletic Club tournament and then won the finals on Sept 20, defeating Clare Cassell (see www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4351606762/ )

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks for finding the article swanq.  We can add the location and date to the caption to fill in a bit more of the story.  It's hard to tell from this photo whether they are getting ready to play, or have finished their match.
